sys_script_include.name: workspaceStarterExpUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_d3382b663f834110a271b0ae9a3f371d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_485912_parenta_0.workspaceStarterExpUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>workspaceStarterExpUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var workspaceStarterExpUtils = Class.create();
workspaceStarterExpUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    checkContextualConfig: function(tableName) {

        //To check Agent assist is configured for current table on workspace

        var gr = new GlideRecord('cxs_table_config');
        gr.addQuery('table', '=', tableName);
        gr.addQuery('ui_type', '=', 'workspace');
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    },
    type: 'workspaceStarterExpUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-27 10:10:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>d3382b663f834110a271b0ae9a3f371d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>workspaceStarterExpUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Parental Leave" source="x_485912_parenta_0">259da3921b430110599142e4cc4bcbae</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Parental Leave">259da3921b430110599142e4cc4bcbae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d3382b663f834110a271b0ae9a3f371d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-27 10:10:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
